description:
Unleash Your Digital Workplace Potential with Compucom 
To be at the forefront of your industry, having the right technology is non-negotiable. We've got you. With over 35 years of industry-leading experience as a managed service provider (MSP), we've earned the trust of giants, including 5 of the top 10 Fortune 500 companies. We specialize in sourcing, integrating, and supporting all your enterprise technology needs. 

Industry-Leading Solutions 
Our expertise spans three primary areas: 
1. Technology Sourcing Solutions: From end-user devices to robust data center equipment, we strategically source and equip every facet of your enterprise. 

2. Managed Services and IT Support: Our exceptional support maximizes workforce productivity, ensuring your technology solutions perform at their best. 

3. Projects and Professional Services: Need to modernize and transform your enterprise? Our team of experts is dedicated to turning your vision into reality. 

Why Compucom Stands Out 
CUSTOMER-CENTRIC APPROACH 
Your success is our core mission. We place you at the center of everything we do, ensuring you adapt swiftly and stay ahead in a competitive landscape. 

RELENTLESS INNOVATION 
Our Full Lifecycle Observability (FLO) service offers unparalleled insight into your IT operations. FLO's data-driven analytics help optimize your infrastructure, elevate the digital employee experience, and enhance your service to customers. 

Join Our Many Long-Term Customers 
When you choose Compucom, you join an impressive roster of organizations who we've helped turn IT challenges into strategic advantages. By leveraging our vast field tech network and Advanced Configuration Centers, you’ll reduce costs, maximize productivity, and enrich both employee and customer experiences. 

Compucom. Technology Driven. People Powered. 

For a transformative IT partnership, visit our website or get in touch with us directly. Let's redefine your digital landscape—together.
name: Compucom
tagline: Transformative IT Solutions to Unlock Business Potential

updates.text:
Is Your Business Ready for Windows 11?

With Windows 10 support ending in October 2025, it’s time to start planning your move to Windows 11. This new OS offers enhanced performance, deeper AI integration, better security, and improved productivity features like Teams and Snap Layouts. A phased rollout and hardware refresh planning can smooth the transition, especially for businesses adopting AI-ready PCs. 

Get ahead by assessing your current infrastructure now and explore workshops to build a tailored roadmap for a seamless migration.

#Win11 #devicelifecycle #infrastructure #productivity

Compucom is taking innovation to new heights with AI and sustainability through HPE Partner Ready Vantage. Learn how our Managed Services Center of Expertise drives full lifecycle services, speeds up time to market, and leverages HPE GreenLake for recurring revenue growth.

Future-proof your business with 5G-enabled devices. With Windows 10's EOS date quickly approaching, now is the perfect time to explore how 5G-capable laptops and tablets can drive productivity, efficiency, and innovation across industries. From seamless remote work to support for IoT and AR/VR, 5G unlocks new opportunities anywhere you need to operate.

Discover how Compucom and T-Mobile For Business can help you stay ahead.

Happy Boss's Day!

Today, we take a moment to celebrate the leaders who inspire, mentor, and empower us every day. We are proud to have leaders who not only drive innovation but also foster a culture of collaboration, growth, and success.

To all the managers who go the extra mile and lead with heart and vision, thank you for creating an environment where people can thrive and achieve great things together.

Join us in showing appreciation for all the leaders who make a difference. Tag a great leader who inspires you!

Windows 10 Support Ends October 2025 – Are You Ready?

Older devices will soon stop receiving security updates, making them vulnerable to risks. Upgrade to Windows 11 Pro for enhanced security, AI-powered productivity, and cost-efficient management. Get ahead of the curve with our tailored migration planning services and workshops.

Download our Quick Reference Guide and schedule your Windows 11 consultation today. https://lnkd.in/g67-e6AY

#windows11 #ITmanagement #AI #security #digitaltransformation

Is your business ready for Windows 11? 
With Windows 10 support ending one year from today, companies must plan now for a smooth migration. Many will need to upgrade hardware to meet new security standards, but this transition is also an opportunity to modernize your IT infrastructure. Compucom can help streamline the process with services like Digital Experience Management, smart technology sourcing, and device lifecycle management—ensuring a smooth migration while enhancing efficiency and security.

#win10 #win11 #msp #devicelifecycle #techsourcing

Today, we take a moment to recognize and celebrate the rich cultures, histories, and contributions of Indigenous peoples. As we reflect on the past, we also commit to listening, learning, and supporting Indigenous communities in our journey toward understanding and reconciliation.

Let’s work together to honor Indigenous voices, promote inclusivity, and foster respect for the diverse cultures that enrich our society. Together, we can build a future rooted in equality and respect for all.

Happy Thanksgiving, Canada!

To all our colleagues, clients, and partners celebrating today, we hope your day is filled with joy and laughter. Wishing you and your loved ones a happy, restful, and safe Thanksgiving.

At Compucom, we believe that mental health is just as important as physical health. On this #WorldMentalHealthDay, we encourage everyone to take a moment for self-care, check in with colleagues, and foster a supportive work environment where mental well-being is prioritized. Let’s break the stigma and advocate for mental health every day.
Don’t miss this exclusive opportunity to explore how HPE + Compucom can transform your IT strategy and drive long-term success.
